books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: A coming-of-age story set in the marshes of North Carolina, where a young girl navigates isolation, love, and a murder investigation.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A classic novel that explores racial injustice and moral growth through the eyes of Scout Finch in 1930s Alabama.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A transformative story about a young shepherd named Santiago who embarks on a journey to discover his personal legend.

books.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
books.author: Stephen R. Covey
books.description: A self-help book that presents seven principles for personal and professional effectiveness.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic romance novel that follows the story of Elizabeth Bennet and her complicated relationship with Mr. Darcy.

books.title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
books.author: Shel Silverstein
books.description: A collection of children's poetry filled with imaginative and whimsical verses.
